Container.Name: TimescaleDB-HA
Container.Overview:
The TimescaleDB-HA Docker image offers the most complete TimescaleDB experience. It uses Ubuntu, includes TimescaleDB Toolkit, and support for PostGIS and Patroni. TimescaleDB is pre-created in the default PostgreSQL database. By default, TimescaleDB is added to any new database you create.
Configuration Parameters
POSTGRES_PASSWORD - Superuser password. Default postgres
Storage
Data and Configuration Path: /mnt/user/appdata/timescaledb-ha This is the directory where TimescaleDB stores its application data and configuration files.
Network
Port 65432 This port is mapped from the default PostgreSQL port 5432 to avoid conflicts if another PostgreSQL container is using the default port.

Config.Name: TimescaleDB access port
Config.Description: TCP connection port mapped to 65432 from 5432 in case of other postgres container present
